mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pw, name, gender, email , tel, post, addr, birth) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{email} , #{tel}, #{post}, #{addr}, #{birth})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update member set name=#{name}, gender=#{gender} where ${social_type} = #{social_email}
mapper.insert: insert into member(name, id, gender, ${social_type}) values(#{name}, #{id}, #{gender}, #{social_email})
mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
